required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Prediction Model of Avastin Plus Chemotherapy in Unresectable Ras Mutant CRLM Patients
clinical_study.official_title: The Prediction Model of Avastin Plus Chemotherapy as First Line Treatment in Unresectable Ras Mutant Colorectal Liver Metastase (CRLM) Patients

brief_summary.textblock: establishment and validation of the prediction model of avastin plus chemotherapy as first line treatment in simultaneous ras mutant unresectable CRLM patients

detailed_description.textblock: Ras mutant unresectable CRLM patients with primary tumor resection followed by avastin in combination with chemotherapy were included in this study. The tumor response was assessed by local MDT group. Based on tumor response, 58 CRLM patients were classified into two groups (CR+PR vs SD+PD). Primary samples of the two group patients will be sequenced by mass spectrum. After MS sequencing, a prediction model will be estimated. Another 58 CRLM patients will be inclued for validation of the prediction model.

primary_outcome.description: response rate will be assessed by local MDT every two months

secondary_outcome.description: overall survival will be assessed by researchers every two months during treatment, and telephone follow-up every three month after treatment
progression free survival will be assessed by local MDT every two months during treatment, and telephone follow-up every three month after treatment

arm_group.description: 58 unresectable simutaneous CRLM patients with ras mutation accepted Avastin plus chemotherapy treatment after primary tumor resection between 2013.01 and 2017.12.
another 58 unresectable simutaneous CRLM patients with ras mutation accepted Avastin plus chemotherapy treatment after primary tumor resection between 2018.01 and 2022.12.

biospec_descr.textblock: primary tumor proteins of CRLM patients before avastin plus chemotherapy treatment will be sequenced by mass spectrum

study_pop.textblock: Simultaneous unresectable CRLM patients(ras mutation) with primary tumor resection before Avastin plus chemotherapy as first line treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
age 18-75 years, histologically proven colorectal adenocarcinoma, with liver-dominant disease, a life expectancy of > 3 months, ras mutation, unresectable simultaneous liver metastasis, ECOG 0-1, written informed consent for participation in the trial.
Exclusion Criteria:
patients with known hypersensitivity reactions to any of the components of the study treatments, pregnancy or breast-feeding, accepted chemotherapy, radiotherapy and target therapy before primary tumor resection, other previous malignancy within 5 years, known drug abuse/alcohol abuse, ECOG>1, legal incapacity or limited legal capacity.
